messages.subject: tempting you for a homeschooling sea change... at an ecovillage
messages.msgSnippet: hi everyone, we have been long term lurkers on this list. We are homeschooling our 4yr old and 3month old. This is an appeal for any homeschoolers out there
messages.messageBody:
hi everyone,

we have been long term lurkers on this list. We are homeschooling our 4yr old and
3month old. This is an appeal for any homeschoolers out there who want a sea change...

we have recently moved from Melbourne to buy/ build in a new ecovillage in Currumbin
Valley Queensland. The web site is:

http://www.theecovillage.com.au

we have already met one lovely couple with an 18 month old who are buying in and share
our approach to natural learning etc.. so we thought that we would shamelessly put this
out into the world so we can connect with other like minds.

If you have considered a sea change why not also check out this ecovillage. We would love
more homeschoolers here! Contact the ecovillage via their web site above for more info...
or contact us if you like. Before you ask NO we dont get commissions - we are just really
keen to have a vibrant homeschooling community here :)

please feel free to pass this onto anyone you know who might be interested. Even if you
are a homeschooler around currumbin/ gold coast please do drop us a line.

all the best,
anne & arun
